synopsis: Two blundering terrorists with lofty ideologies, but ordinary talent, on a mission to change the world.
tagline: Two Aspiring Terrorists. One Identical Plan. No Damn Clue!
casting: ['Ritesh Deshmukh', 'Pulkit Samrat', 'Rajesh Sharma', 'Zachary Coffin', 'Tom Alter', 'Arya Babbar', 'Kumud Mishra', 'Marta Żmuda Trzebiatowska', 'Chandan Roy Sanyal', 'Erika Guntherová', 'Shivkumar Subramaniam', 'Aakash Dabhade', 'Tomasz Karolak', 'Aakash Pandey', 'Jacqueline Fernandez', 'Janusz Chabior']

synopsis: In Argentina, between 1982 and 1985, the Puccios, a well-established family of San Isidro, an upper-class suburb of Buenos Aires, kidnap several people and hold them as hostages for a ransom.
tagline: The true story of Argentina's most notorious crime family
casting: ['Guillermo Francella', 'Peter Lanzani', 'Gastón Cocchiarale', 'Franco Masini', 'Giselle Motta', 'Antonia Bengoechea', 'Liliana Popovich', 'Stefanía Koessl', 'Miguel Ángel Lembo', 'Aldo Onofri', 'Aníbal Barengo', 'Fabio Aste', 'Fernando Miró', 'Juan Cruz Márquez de la Serna', 'Santiago Privitera', 'Tomás de las Heras', 'Joaquín Berthold', 'Jorge Sabaté', 'Francisco Donovan', 'Soledad Gómez Schweizer', 'Silvina Gómez Schweizer', 'Luis Armesto', 'Pablo Caramelo']
compagnies_production: ['El Deseo', 'Matanza Cine', 'INCAA', 'Telefe', 'ICAA', 'Telefónica Studios', 'K & S Films', 'VFX Boat']

synopsis: Rouva Presidentti is a documentary on Tarja Halonen, the 11th President of Finland. The movie follows Halonen for one and a half years, during her last times as President.
tagline: A film about an unusual profession... and the woman behind the profession.
casting: ['Tarja Halonen', 'Pentti Arajärvi', 'Eila Nevalainen', 'Heli Sariola', 'Päivi Kairamo-Hella', 'Ann-Marie Nyroos', 'Sanna Viitanen', 'Jukka Jokinen', 'Marko Kivelä', 'Kaarle Vikström', 'Jukka Lindstedt']
